constraints.name: query_limit
constraints.description: 查询次数限制为 n + 500 次

constraints.name: binary_string_length
constraints.description: 每次查询的字符串长度必须等于 n

constraints.name: binary_characters
constraints.description: 每次查询的字符串只能包含字符 '0' 和 '1'
constraints.formal: Q[i] ∈ {0, 1} for all i in [0, n-1]

constraints.name: jump_response
constraints.description: JUMP 查询的响应值只能是 0、n/2 或 n

constraints.name: termination_condition
constraints.description: 当查询结果为 n 时，表示找到隐藏字符串 S 并终止程序
